clean_text:
Synthesis of the two complexes

(+)-Camphor-10-sulfonic acids (0.116 g, 0.5 mmol) and hexamine (0.5 mmol, 0.07g) were added to an aqueous solution (10 mL) of acetic acid silver (0.5 mmol, 0.084g). After the mixture was stirred for 15 min, the precipitate was dissolved by dropwise addition of aqueous solution of NH3 (14M). Colorless crystals of complex 1 were obtained by evaporation of the solution for 5 days at room temperature (52% yield). The complex 2 was obtained by the same method with the (-)-camphor-10-sulfonic acids.
